hero.headline: Precision Forging. Global Strength.
hero.subheadline: Delivering high-performance bearing rings, auto parts, and precision-forged components from India to the world.

about.title: Engineering Excellence Forged in Trust
about.description: BELANARO FORGE LLP is a global manufacturer and exporter of bearing rings, automotive components, precision-forged parts, and customized closed & open die forgings.
about.visionText: To be a trusted global name in precision forging and engineering excellence.
about.missionText: To deliver world-class forged components that meet global standards and build sustainable, trust-based partnerships across continents.

products.title: Forged Range of Excellence
products.subtitle: We manufacture and export a complete range of precision-forged components for automotive, bearing, and industrial applications.
products.bearingDesc: Precision-forged and machined rings designed for high-speed, high-performance bearings.
products.autoDesc: Forged components for steering, suspension, transmission, and drivetrain applications.
products.flangesDesc: Heavy-duty forged flanges and shafts offering excellent mechanical strength and durability.
products.precisionDesc: Custom-engineered parts designed to meet specific industrial requirements.
products.customDesc: Bespoke forging solutions developed according to client drawings and material specifications.

manufacturing.title: Where Technology Meets Strength
manufacturing.subtitle: Our state-of-the-art manufacturing unit in Rajkot, Gujarat, combines modern machinery, automation, and skilled manpower.
manufacturing.inHouseProcess: Complete In-House Forging to Machining Process
manufacturing.capacity: Flexible Capacity for Bulk & Custom Orders

quality.title: Quality That Performs Under Pressure
quality.subtitle: BELANARO FORGE LLP maintains zero-defect quality through strict control at every stage of production.

global.title: Delivering Quality Beyond Borders
global.subtitle: With exports spanning across Europe, the USA, the Middle East, and Asia, BELANARO FORGE LLP has established itself as a reliable name in the international forging industry.
global.quote: Our strength lies not only in the metal we forge — but in the relationships we build.

dealer.title: Partner with BELANARO FORGE – Grow with Us
dealer.subtitle: Join our global network of distributors and importers.

contact.title: Let's Build a Strong Partnership
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out for inquiries, collaboration, or dealership opportunities.
contact.name: Name
